trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGYOK6AGAVEJAWS_00904_SOVLI_000_000<tab>Ah, a traveler! Welcome to Agave Jaws, friend. How can I be of service?

TEXT_REGYOK6AGAVEJAWS_00904_SOVLI_000_001<tab>Word that Valigarmanda is on the loose has reached us even here. And just after the Third Promise fended off a horde of monsters for us... It seems we cannot be afforded even a moment's respite.
TEXT_REGYOK6AGAVEJAWS_00904_SOVLI_000_002<tab>For a blessing, Valigarmanda never ventured here. Now that he is vanquished, I can return my attention to the farm without fear for my life.

TEXT_REGYOK6AGAVEJAWS_00904_SOVLI_000_003<tab>Perhaps I should prepare our finest agaves for distillation in honor of our new Dawnservants. No doubt they are busy with their many duties, but surely there will come a night where they can relax and enjoy a few glasses of mezcal.

TEXT_REGYOK6AGAVEJAWS_00904_SOVLI_000_010<tab>Oh, many things! I examine the soil and weather to ensure our agaves grow in the best conditions possible, decide the pace at which they are cultivated, and determine how many are prepared for distillation.

TEXT_REGYOK6AGAVEJAWS_00904_SOVLI_000_011<tab>Nothing pleases me more than when someone takes an interest in the farm! My colleagues and I spend all day looking after the agaves─I suppose it just feels nice when our hard work is appreciated.
TEXT_REGYOK6AGAVEJAWS_00904_SOVLI_000_020<tab>Why, it's an agave farm of course! We collect their sap and distill it to make mezcal.

TEXT_REGYOK6AGAVEJAWS_00904_SOVLI_000_021<tab>As for the farm's namesake, well, just look at how neatly we have the plants lined up! Doesn't the view remind you of a wild beast's gaping maw? Er, not that I've seen one up close...
